wikipedia_page.main: Piers Gibbon is an English television and radio presenter, writer, and self-styled "adventurer".Gibbon has hosted a number of travel documentaries about indigenous peoples and traditional medicine. He is the author of Tribe: Endangered Peoples of the World (Cassell 2010).

response: In addition to locally produced programming, Resonance is a member of Radia and a rebroadcaster of American news program Democracy Now!. Resonance FM has received a Sony Award nomination for The Good Drugs Guide, a documentary series presented by Piers Gibbon and David McCandless. The station has been profiled in the pages of The Guardian, The Independent on Sunday, The Daily Telegraph and the Morning Star amongst others.
